title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 323.2 - Designating contacts for the portal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 323.2 - Designating contacts for the portal

State Regulations

As more fully set forth in section
324.3, section
324.4, section
325-1.4
and section
442.4
of Title 12 NYCRR, insurance
carriers, self-insured employers, or third-party administrators must provide
the Chair or his or her designee in the manner prescribed by the Chair with the
name and contact information for the point(s) of contact for a prior
authorization request (PAR) on or before May 1, 2021. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
323.2

Adopted

New

York State Register July 21, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 29, eff. 7/21/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
